Description:
Remote.exe is part of WinDbg in the Windows SDK and can be used for AWL bypass and running remote files.

Author: Christopher Peacock @SecurePeacock, SCYTHE @scythe_io
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Use of Remote.exe
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\remote.exe' and original_file_name = 'remote.exe'
